for i, col in enumerate(train_dataset.iloc[:, 19:30]):
    x = i // 3
    y = i%3

source.26a8a924:
def encoder(dataset):
    le = LabelEncoder()
    for i in range(19):
        dataset.iloc[:, i] = le.fit_transform(dataset.iloc[:, i])
    return dataset

train_dataset = encoder(train_dataset)
train_dataset.head()
